Class SegmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • obfuscated.DH
      • org.schema.game.common.controller.SegmentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    obfuscated.acX, obfuscated.adp, obfuscated.adx, obfuscated.K, obfuscated.MU, obfuscated.wY, obfuscated.xp, obfuscated.Ym, org.schema.schine.network.Identifiable, org.schema.schine.network.objects.Sendable

    public abstract class SegmentController
extends obfuscated.DH
implements obfuscated.K, obfuscated.MU
    This class represents all entities, which are composed of blocks

        public obfuscated.wt[] getNeighborElements(org.schema.common.util.linAlg.Vector3i vector3i,
                                  short n,
                                  obfuscated.wt[] array)
        Fetches the blocks neighboring a block at the given location.
        Parameters:
        vector3i - the location of the block
        n - the id of the block one is looking for or Short.MAX_VALUE if one is looking for all blocks

        array
